sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { MusicServiceService } from '../service/music-service.service'; import { Artist } from '../models/Artist'; // The @Component decorator defines the metadata for the ListArtistsComponent @Component({ selector: 'app-list-artists', // The custom HTML tag used for this component templateUrl: './list-artists.component.html', // The layout for the component styleUrls: ['./list-artists.component.css'] // The styles specific to this component }) export class ListArtistsComponent implements OnInit { artists: Artist[] = []; // Stores the list of Artist objects for display selectedArtist: Artist | null = null;// Stores the currently selected Artist, if any // The constructor injects the ActivatedRoute and MusicServiceService // ActivatedRoute is used for accessing the route parameters, // MusicServiceService is the service providing the music data. constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private service: MusicServiceService) { } // ngOnInit is a lifecycle hook called after the component is initialized. // Here, we subscribe to query parameters and refresh the artists list when they change. ngOnInit(): void { this.musicService.getArtists((artists) => { // Assign fetched artists to the component property this.artists = artists; }); } // onSelectArtist is an event handler for selecting an artist from the list. // It updates the selectedArtist property and logs the artist's name to the console. public onSelectArtist(artist: Artist) { console.log("Selected Artist of " + artist.Name); this.selectedArtist = artist; // Update the selected artist } }
